Articles.Content: What do these mean? When do I need to list them in the staging? What does it do?
Yeah, I was gonna ask that, too.

I heard during one of the live streams that it activates the science.

... I don't know exactly what that means and have not tested it out.

I put them at the top... above the chutes... so they never actually get staged...
I tested it, seems useless. Maybe it's a placeholder

It's actually a bug: in experimentals we did some testing to see if science experiments in the staging list would be useful. It was decided that it was not and they were removed, just the pods remained
Yeah I heard it was supposed to science when stage, but does nothing for me.
